watch_n.definition: A small timepiece worn on the wrist or carried in a pocket.

watch_v.definition: To look at or observe attentively over a period of time.

watch_adj.definition: Related to or resembling a watch.

watch_adv.definition: In a manner related to watching or timekeeping.
watch_adv.example: He observed watch-like, never taking his eyes off.

watch_conj.definition: Used to compare or link ideas related to time (rare).

watch_prep.definition: Referring to position relative to a watch (rare).
watch_prep.example: She kept the note by her watch.
